flawed_nl_solution:
First find the number of mice the snake eats each year: 52 weeks/year / 4 weeks/mouse = <<52/4=31>>31 mice/year
Then multiply the number of mice the snake eats per year by the number of years per decade to find the number of mice it eats per decade: 31 mice/year * 10 years/decade = <<31*10=310>>310 mice/decade
#### 310

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 13, not 31. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
